title: Screw Irelia
body: Completely sick of seeing that zero weakness, zero counterplay total fricken bs champ. She has like 2 counters max. Strong at all stages of the game. Can't escape her, can't chase her. Can't shield, and if you don't have true damage, you can't hardly even hurt her. Fricken toxic waste that she is.

replies.body: My match history says otherwise... I think I'm just bad

> [{quoted}](name=Sunbae Irelia,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=T2kFhWyp,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-11-01T04:30:46.896+0000)
>
> My match history says otherwise... I think I'm just bad

I know the feels man, bit still, screw that champ. No offense.

> [{quoted}](name=DarukongSr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=T2kFhWyp,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-10-31T23:20:49.726+0000)
>
> Screw Irelia

She isn't real, though. She's just a drawing. :(
